text: The International Journal of Asian Studies is a peer-reviewed academic journal covering research in the social sciences and humanities as pertaining to Asia. The journal was established in 2004 and is published on behalf of the Institute for Advanced Studies on Asia (University of Tokyo). == External links == * * Institute for the Advanced Studies on Asia Category:Asian studies journals Category:Publications established in 2004 Category:Cambridge University Press academic journals Category:Biannual journals Category:English-language journals Category:Academic journals associated with universities and colleges
title: International Journal of Asian Studies
